meanings.definition: Excessive pride in one's own achievements or qualities.
meanings.sent1: Her vaingloriousnesses about her grades made her classmates feel inferior.
meanings.sent2: His vaingloriousnesses often overshadowed his actual accomplishments.
meanings.sent3: Despite his vaingloriousnesses, he still struggled with self-doubt.
meanings.sent4: The vaingloriousnesses of the peacock were unmatched in the animal kingdom.
meanings.sent5: The king's vaingloriousnesses led to his downfall as his people grew tired of his arrogance.

meanings.definition: The quality of being excessively proud or boastful.
meanings.sent1: The vaingloriousnesses of the actor were evident in every interview he gave.
meanings.sent2: Her vaingloriousnesses often rubbed people the wrong way.
meanings.sent3: Despite his vaingloriousnesses, he was surprisingly humble about his cooking skills.
meanings.sent4: The vaingloriousnesses of the politician were a facade to hide his insecurities.
meanings.sent5: The vaingloriousnesses of the singer were tolerated by fans due to her exceptional talent.

meanings.definition: A feeling of excessive pride or self-importance.
meanings.sent1: His vaingloriousnesses were evident in the way he carried himself.
meanings.sent2: The team captain's vaingloriousnesses often alienated his teammates.
meanings.sent3: Despite her vaingloriousnesses, she was kind to everyone she met.
meanings.sent4: The vaingloriousnesses of the CEO made it difficult for employees to approach him.
meanings.sent5: The vaingloriousnesses of the artist were reflected in every brushstroke of his masterpiece.
